rules.desc: 3DEXPERIENCE node with purpose value from connector and non-editable
Node specific to integration with Purpose value as For Edit by default and editable
Node not specific to integration with purpose value as Exclude and non-editable
Purpose value of node specific to integration of specified IEF Type Classification or cadtype should be non-editable
Node specific to integration with Purpose value as Read-Only by default and editable
To propagate Purpose value from given node to its n-level children node if they it matches the specific cadtype or IEF Type Classification
To propagate Purpose value from given node to its n-level children node if it matches the specified purpose
